[IAC] Connection refused on host localhost when launching tests.

Using the TPTP-4.4.0-200705040100 build, launching a simple Hello World test via the new IAC causes the following error:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.hyades.test.core 1 0 2007-05-04 10:11:13.984
!MESSAGE java.lang.NullPointerException
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at java.io.File.<init>(File.java:220)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.platform.iac.administrator.internal.common.AdminUtil.isConfigEmpty(AdminUtil.java:396)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.platform.iac.administrator.internal.startstop.AutoStartStop.startIAC(AutoStartStop.java:71)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.internal.execution.local.control.NodeImpl.connect(NodeImpl.java:283)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.execution.local.NodeImpl.connectUsingLegacyMethod(NodeImpl.java:431)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.execution.local.NodeImpl._connect(NodeImpl.java:122)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.execution.local.NodeImpl.connect(NodeImpl.java:359)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.execution.local.NodeImpl.connect(NodeImpl.java:347)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.execution.harness.TestExecutionHarness$4.run(TestExecutionHarness.java:2433)
	at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:803)

!ENTRY org.eclipse.hyades.test.core 4 0 2007-05-04 10:11:29.062
!MESSAGE IWAT4039E The Test Execution Harness reported the following problems:Connection refused on host localhost.

As discussed with Paul, this error message is caused when IAC is not included in the driver.  Paul had pulled this driver from our internal build page, which doesn't include IAC.  There is another defect open to give a better error message when IAC can't be resolved: https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=185243

I'm returning this defect with the agreement of Paul.
Correct.  This defect cannot be reproduced using the public download of the same build.
